PartyBusinessRegion.name: PartyBusinessRegion
PartyBusinessRegion.description: Represents the trading regions of a party, covering both domestic and international locations, where the business entity is actively involved in trading activities.

BusinessRegionName.description: Specifies the name of the region where business activities are conducted.

BusinessRegionType.description: Specifies the type of geographical region where business activities are conducted.

EndDate.description: The date when the party stopped the trade activities with the country.

IsActiveTradeRegion.description: Indicates whether a business entity is currently trading in the region (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: A unique number that represents the party business region.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

PartyProfileId.description: The party profile associated with the party business region.

RecordTypeId.description: ID of the record type associated with the relationship.

RegionReferenceObjectId.description: The country or state where the business activities are conducted.

RegionRevenuePercent.description: The percentage of the overall revenue contributed by the party trading region.

StartDate.description: The date when the party started the trade activities with the country.

TradeType.description: Specifies the type of financial transfer associated with the party.
